doc.title: Juste une femme
doc.plot: Teheran, October, 2000. One year ago, Morvarid was a man. Since her operation, she lives her femininity shielded from glances, between the four walls of her apartment. For the first time, she's covered with a chador and gets ready to go out as a woman ; we are going to follow her metamorphosis. How, in a country as Iran, can one have the will to be a woman?
